[[inst_hl_shi]]
==== HL.SHI

*Syntax:* hl.shi SrcD, [SrcR, simm]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_shi.svg[HL.SHI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/LONG
